features: 𝗘𝗿𝗴𝗼𝗻𝗼𝗺𝗶𝗰 𝗢𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗿: BestEra big and tall office chair is designed for sitting for long hours, whose lumbar support and headrest in line with the human waist, neck curve, helping you adjust the sitting posture, relieve the pain of the back and lumbar spine when working for a long time. The cushion adopts an upgraded sponge and 20 independent spring packs, to achieve a balance of support and soft comfort, sedentary not tired.

𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗻 𝗔𝗽𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻: Executive office chair allow you to enhance your visual enjoyment while comfortable. Wrapped in high-quality PU leather, both soft, skin-friendly and resistant to scratches, stains, peeling, cracking, long time use does not fade and easy to clean, suitable for home, office, conference room, reception room and varieties of colors can be selected according to your needs.

𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗔𝗱𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲: Make your own chair, the seat height of the high back office chair can be adjusted up and down in the range of 4 inches, the chair backrest can recline between 90° and 135° to meet your different needs for work, relax and rest. Home office desk chairs have a retractable footrest that can be pulled out when your legs feel uncomfortable or you want to take a nap for rest.

𝗘𝗮𝘀𝘆 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗱𝘆: The package includes detailed installation instructions and tools so that you can assemble the chair yourself. We have also uploaded the installation video on the product page for your reference. Once installation complete, you will find the leather office chair is sturdy enough, equipped with five stable and durable castors that rotate 360° and slide smoothly and silently across different floors.

𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗿𝘆-𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗔𝗳𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗮𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲: If you need help assembling or using our products, please feel free to contact our Customer Service Team by email. We will spare no effort to assist you with any problems. The warranty period is 1 year, we assure to provide you with the highest level of after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BestEra Executive Leather Office Chairs - Excellent Office Companion Is the mesh office chair too ordinary? Discover BestEra's executive leather office chair, designed for sedentary people with its durable PU leather and ergonomic design for a super comfortable experience.

Once sit on this big and tall office chair, you can experience that the back of the body is well fitted, the thickened and widened headrest helps to relax the neck, the enhanced lumbar support relieves the pain of the lumbar spine and the footrest helps to relax legs after long hours sitting.

While the cushion of a normal chair is only filled with a layer of sponge, this high back office chair uses a more resilient sponge and adds 20 individual spring packs, which provide enough support while being silent, so that your hip gets the best treatment while sitting.

This desk chair has a reliable back tilt adjustment function and can adjust the seat height within 4 inches up and down according to your desk height, relying on the safety-verified solid chassis and air rod, the service life of this ergonomic office chair is effectively extended.

BestEra Leather Office Chairs - Trust BestEra, Get the best. BestEra Leather Chair 8801 is suitable for a variety of occasions and rooms, like home, office, conference room, and reception room. There are 4 colors that can be selected according to your needs. We would like to accompany you every second of your sitting time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very very good chair
reviews.reviewText: Delivery came sooner than expected! Instructions were clear, put it together in about 25 minutes by myself. Looks very nice. It is very comfortable. I bought this since I work from home and need to sit for hours everyday and I can definitely see myself sitting in this chair for long periods. The footrest is a great added bonus. The chair reclines pretty far and you can also lock it in a seated position. The armrests move with the chair if you recline or sit which I thought was pretty cool.The white looks great. The wheels and part of the armrest are black so it’s a nice contrast. It looks and feels luxuriousI did notice two threads in the backrest that were coming loose but it’s not a big deal. All in all this is a very sturdy chair. I’m a big man, about 250 lbs and I am confident this will hold me no problem. Good lumbar support and overall very comfortable. My wife said she’s jealous and she wants one now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing chair - gorgeous, easy assembly and so comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: First, the assembly instructions were fantastic. I am usually horrible at putting things together but this was so easy. Second, this chair is SO comfortable. That is actually a plus and a minus. The chair reclines quite far back, which is so nice. But too tempting (almost) when I am trying to work. Third, it is really beautiful. And the price was so reasonable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Comfortable, Great back support, Feels High Quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as my home office chair and it is everything I wanted. Very soft cushioning, great back support, the foot rest is great when I lean back to stretch. It is wide enough for tall and big people and fits in the well of the desk. The arms fold up so I can push it directly against the desk for more space in the room. It is comfortable and looks good!Assembly was not bad in my opinion. Only took me 30 mins. Instructions were straightforward, just make sure to tighten everything and read carefully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am sooo happy with this chair! I work from home and am in front of the computer all day. My last chair had my lower back and neck severely hurting. This chair is firm, roomy and comfortable. It was also easy to put together. It feels and looks expensive. Great addition to my home office!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice office/ gaming chair
reviews.reviewText: Decently pleased with this chair. Looks nice, comfort is a 7/10. Not plush, but seems like a durable cushion. Back support is adequate. Easy to build out of the box, even comes with a few extra bolts in case of a quality issue.I hope the back locking mechanism stays strong over the next few years. There’s no spring or tensioner to adjust for the leaning back resistance. Instead it’s a lock in place lever.I’m 6’2” and 230 lbs, I’m happy with its dimensions. I wasn’t expecting too much with the leg rest but it’s actually pretty nice. A little narrow, but it turns the office chair into a kind of Lazy boy.All in all I give it a 8/10 rating. Would recommend. Decent chair for a decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seriously sexy and comfortable office chair
reviews.reviewText: High back, plush, sturdy, durable, and easy-to-install. Glides easily across my glass carpet protector and is very quiet. Comes with a hideaway foot rest and allows you to lean back up to a 45 degree angle. Highly recommend for people who WFH and are in a chair 8-10 hours a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cmortable and spacious
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely one of the best office chairs I have sat in. It is a bit oversized which my boyfriend and I both like because we can share an office chair and both sit comfortably. It does recline with a foot rest that was more sturdy than I was expecting and tucks away nicely when not in use. I work from home and my boyfriend works in media, so we are often sitting down for long stretches of time. Other chairs have left me feeling sore but this one is semi-plush allowing for support during long stretches without deteriorating. I think it was on sale when I bought it but overall the price point is perfect for the quality you receive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IT WORKS! And my husband loves it!
reviews.reviewText: A little bit of a wrestling match but definitely do-able for a 70 yr old lady with arthritis! Quality product and really feels like it will last a long time. I had bought my husband replacements for his worn out, disreputable OLD chair twice over the past 6 years and he hated both of them (I got one and my sister the other) but wouldn't go find a replacement, so we added more pillows, pads, covers, etc, over the years but then I got this one. HE LOVES IT! And the chair almost reclines flat, the leg rest is easy to use and perfectly positioned. I hit it outta the park this time. He says it is so comfortable and works so well. Can definitely recommend this one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Elegant and Comfortable Executive Chair for Long Working Hours
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely delighted with this high-back executive office chair, which combines luxurious comfort with professional elegance. Assembly was incredibly easy, and the quality of the brown leather upholstery with diamond quilted stitching is top-notch, offering both style and durability. The chair provides excellent support and comfort, thanks to its padded headrest and contoured back. Its smooth height adjustment and swivel features add convenience to its use. This chair is not just a purchase but a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking to enhance their work experience and office aesthetic.

I am super happy with this chair! I was looking for an executive style chair with a high back (I am 5 feet 7) and this is so comfy! It reclines back quite far and love the added touch of the foot rest. I have been using it for a month and a half now and it looks just like the day it was set up. Really easy install too. I need the extra back support so I added and back rest and it made a world of difference for me personally.

My husband says chair is very comfortable & likes it alot! Lots of sitting room, not tight fitting . Thankyou, this made for an excellent Christmas gift! Fast delivery & easy to put together. Adjustable.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Faux Leather Throne for the Office!
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit, when I saw those typos in the ad for this white faux leather office chair, I couldn't help but raise an eyebrow. But you know what they say, "No typos, no glory!" So, I took a leap of faith, and boy, am I glad I did!First things first, assembling this beauty was a breeze. It was like a jigsaw puzzle made for adults — no frustration, just satisfaction as everything clicked into place. As a self-proclaimed "assembly-challenged" individual, I felt like a DIY champion!Now, let's talk about comfort. This chair is like sitting on a cloud made of marshmallows. Seriously, it's that cushy! From the moment I nestled into its ergonomic design, I could feel my worries melting away. And here's the best part: my neck and back pain have vanished into thin air! It's like this chair has magical healing powers hidden beneath its faux leather exterior.Not only does this chair provide unparalleled comfort, but it also elevates the style of my office space. The sleek white faux leather gives it a modern and professional look, making me feel like I'm the CEO of a hip start-up, even on Mondays.So, if you're searching for the perfect office chair that combines style, comfort, and the ability to vanquish back pain, look no further. This white faux leather throne is a five-star winner in my book! Typos may have raised an eyebrow, but this chair has raised my spirits and productivity to new heights.Highly recommended for all the office warriors out there craving a touch of luxury and ergonomic awesomeness. Trust me, you won't regret it!Keep calm, sit comfortably, and conquer your workday like a boss!

reviews.reviewTitle: A little firm, but not bad.
reviews.reviewText: I got this so I could sleep at my WFH desk and work on things late at night. The footrest is okay, but expect your legs to stretch a little if you use it for extended periods. The padding is more firm than I was expecting, but a pillow or two actually makes a world of difference. It can get really comfortable with some bed pillows where you need them.Other than that, this is pretty good! The recline feature works well, and the footrest keeps your feet up, though don't beat it up. If you're leaning back a lot, bring a pillow with you for better neck support. It looks great too. I was not expecting how much it would class-up my WFH office. Very nice. I'm not sure how long the pleather is going to last, but if I get a couple years out of it, it'll be money well-spent.
